item.title: How to Build HUGO Website?
item.description: Hugo is a general-purpose website framework. Technically speaking, Hugo is a static site generator. Unlike systems that dynamically build a page with each visitor request, Hugo builds pages when you create or update your content. Deploy Hugo as a GitHub Pages project or personal/organizational site and automate the whole process with a simple shell script. GitHub provides free and fast static hosting over SSL for personal, organization, or project pages directly from a GitHub repository via its GitHub Pages service.
